## Part 1: Process the data

```{r}
buzzfeed <- read.csv("https://www.macalester.edu/~ajohns24/data/buzzfeed.csv")

buzzfeed <- buzzfeed %>% 
  mutate(title = as.character(title),
         text = as.character(text),
         url = as.character(url))

'%!in%' <- function(x, y)!('%in%'(x,y))
```
